Unnamed Sibling |friends = |relationships = [[Joey Tribbiani]] (ex-boyfriend) }} In "[[The One With The Sharks]]", [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] meets '''Hayley''' and asks her out (with some interruption from [[Gunther]]). On their date, upon returning to Hayley's apartment, Joey realizes that he may have already had sex with her. He is extremely offended that she doesn't remember him, despite the fact that he didn't remember her. Finally confronting her, Joey realizes that it was not her that he slept with, but her roommate. Unfortunately, he only realizes this because Hayley's roommate walks in. Haley is disgusted with him and he leaves after seeing he screwed up. ==Family== Hayley's parents are [[Divorces|divorced]], after 25-years of marriage. Hayley says she took it the hardest. She has at least one older sibling.
